Hydras:

"Then May I ask my men back, My tutor?"hissed politely Hydras"Without them 
My cause is lost... and I dont have enough time to run my experiment"

-----Original Message----- 
From: Super Cyclonus
Sent: Monday, December 06, 2010 4:11 PM
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: The wrath of the Hydra/The return of a decepticon

> <OLD>
>
>
> "for my experiment... Incase that it goes wrong, a female would be easy to
> handle... and finish it I dont like  the same situation in my base that
> happen when Rampage masaccred a Maximal Colony"said Hydras without said 
> more

Cryotek frowned when Hydras so easily mentioned utilizing the female
protoform, the one that conveniently had the temporal signature. He
looked as if he were about to say something when his comm beeped.

"What?" he said brusquely into the mic. He listened to the reply,
which was obviously in his ear since no one could hear anything. He
nodded and looked over at Hydras, "I have some interesting news." His
voice was casual with traces of humor in it as he spoke, "It would
seem that your base is under some sort of attack." he said. "Perhaps
you should finish this at some other time."

(TAG)

Preston
